get.description: Returns statistics for all leverage strategy vaults.

protocol.description: The lending protocol used for the leverage strategy.

market.description: The lending protocol market that is utilized for the leverage strategy.

vaultAddress.description: The address of the strategy vault.

totalDepositUsd.description: The USD value of deposits in the strategy vault.

totalTvlUsd.description: The TVL of the strategy vault denominated in USD.

netAPY.description: The net estimated percentage returns for the strategy.

apyVote.description: The APY from Factor Scale incentives allocated to this vault based on current vault deposits.

apyVoteProjected.description: The estimated APY from Factor Scale incentives allocated to this vault.

voteWeight.description: The Factor Scale weight modifier applied to each vote fot this strategy.

scaleRewardPriceUsd.description: The USD value of the incentive token distributed via Factor Scale.

scaleRewardPerSecond.description: The USD value per second of Factor Scale incentives which is being distributed to depositors in this strategy.

pairTvl.description: The USD value of the tokens that are deposited in the strategy.

pairName.description: The strategy name which includes the token pair.

isRestaking.description: Indicates if the strategy is a restaking strategy.

isStakable.description: Indicates if the strategy can be staked to be eligible for FactorDAO rewards.

stakedVaultAddress.description: The address of the staked vault. Factor implements a governance wrapper that enables the strategy to receive FactorDAO incentives.

borrowRate.description: The interest rate that is charged for borrowing the debt token.

maxLeverage.description: The maximum amount of leverage allowable for the strategy. This is determined by the underlying lending pool.

priceUsd.description: The USD value of the asset token.

address.description: The asset token smart contract address.

supplyApy.description: The interest earned when lending the asset token to the underlying lending pool.

borrowApr.description: The interest owed when borrowing the asset token from the underlying lending pool.

label.description: The type of additional interest earned on the asset token.

apy.description: The additional interest amount in APY.

label.description: The type of additional interest owed on the asset token.

apy.description: The additional interest amount in APY.

totalSupplyApy.description: The total interest rate earned on the asset token.

totalBorrowApy.description: The total interest rate owed on the asset token.

loanToValue.description: The ratio between the value of the strategy assets to the total amount loaned

threshold.description: The liquidation threshold for the leverage pair denominated in asset token.

maxLeverage.description: The maximum amount of leverage for the asset token.

minHealthFactor.description: The minimum Health Factor value below which the position is liable to be force liquidated.

isAsset.description: Indictaes whether the token is the asset token.

isDebt.description: Indictaes whether the token is the debt token.

isDisabled.description: Indicates if the token has been disabled on Factor.

ptTokenMetadata.description: Metadata associated with the principal token for Pendle PT leverage strategies.

underlyingTokenSymbol.description: The symbol for the token underlying the PT.

expiryTimestamp.description: The UNIX timestamp at which the PT matures/expires.

pendleMarketAddress.description: The address of the Pendle market for the PT.

isExpired.description: Indicates if the PT has already matured/expired.

underlyingTokenAddress.description: The address of the token underlying the PT.

market.description: The market for the asset token on the underlying lending protocol.

vaultAddress.description: The address of the asset vault on the underlying lending protocol.

priceUsd.description: The USD value of the debt token.

address.description: The debt token smart contract address.

supplyApy.description: The interest earned when lending the debt token to the underlying lending pool.

borrowApr.description: The interest owed when borrowing the debt token from the underlying lending pool.

label.description: The type of additional interest earned on the debt token.

apy.description: The additional interest amount in APY.

label.description: The type of additional interest owed on the debt token.

apy.description: The additional interest amount in APY.

totalSupplyApy.description: The total interest rate earned on the debt token.

totalBorrowApy.description: The total interest rate owed on the debt token.

loanToValue.description: The ratio between the value of the strategy debt to the total amount loaned

threshold.description: The liquidation threshold for the leverage pair denominated in debt token.

maxLeverage.description: The maximum amount of leverage for the debt token.

minHealthFactor.description: The minimum Health Factor value below which the position is liable to be force liquidated.

isAsset.description: Indictaes whether the token is the asset token.

isDebt.description: Indictaes whether the token is the debt token.

isDisabled.description: Indicates if the token has been disabled on Factor.

market.description: The market for the debt token on the underlying lending protocol.

vaultAddress.description: The address of the debt vault on the underlying lending protocol.

openedPositions.description: Array of positions which have been opened for this strategy.

apyBoost.description: The APY of incentives allocated to this strategy via Factor Boost based on current deposits.

apyBoostProjected.description: The estimated APY of Factor Boost incentives allocated to this strategy.

vaultAddress.description: The address of the Boost vault where the incentive token is held.

tokenAddress.description: The address of the token being distributed via Factor Boost.

tokenSymbol.description: The symbol of the token being distributed via Factor Boost.

minAmount.description: The minimum amount of Boost incentive tokens that can be distributed in wei.

minAmountFmt.description: The minimum amount of Boost incentive tokens that can be distributed. Formatted per incentive token decimals.

totalRewardAmount.description: The amount of incentive tokens which have been allocated to Factor Boost for this period in wei.

totalRewardAmountFmt.description: The amount of incentive tokens which have been allocated to Factor Boost for this period. Formatted per incentive token decimals.

lastUpdateTime.description: The UNIX timestamp at which the Boost allocation was last updated.

periodFinish.description: The UNIX timestamp at which the Boost allocation will be completed.

rewardPerTokenStored.description: The amount of incentive tokens that is allocated to each deposit token within the strategy in wei.

rewardPerTokenStoredFmt.description: The amount of incentive tokens that is allocated to each deposit token within the strategy in wei. Formatted per incentive token decimals.

rewardRate.description: The APR that depositors to the strategy will earn based on the period which this incentive token will be distributed.

rewardRateFmt.description: The APR that depositors to the strategy will earn based on the period which this incentive token will be distributed. Formatted per incentive token decimals.

tokenDecimal.description: The number of decimals specified by the incentive token contract.

priceUsd.description: The USD value of the incentive token.

apy.description: The APY of this Boost vault.

isBoosted.description: Indicates if the strategy is receiving Factor Boost incentives.

isScaled.description: Indicates if the strategy is receiving Factor Scale incentives.

fetched_at.description: The UNIX timestamp at which the data for this strategy was retrieved.

identifier.description: The identifier to uniquely identify the strategy.

get.description: Returns statistics for all yield strategy vaults.

schema.description: An array of objects, each representing a yield strategy vault.

vaultAddress.description: The address of the strategy vault.

vaultName.description: The strategy name which includes the underlying token as well as the lending protocol.

vaultSymbol.description: The symbol of the yield vault which is a concatenation of protocol, token, and auto-compounder strategy type.

isStagging.description: Indicates if the strategy is in the staging environment.

isStakable.description: Indicates if the strategy can be staked to be eligible for FactorDAO rewards.

tvlUsd.description: The TVL of the strategy vault denominated in USD.

apyBase.description: The base Annual Percentage Yield that is accrued by the strategy.

apyVote.description: The APY from Factor Scale incentives allocated to this vault based on current vault deposits.

apyVoteProjected.description: The estimated APY from Factor Scale incentives allocated to this vault.

isScaled.description: Indicates if the strategy is receiving Factor Scale incentives.

voteWeight.description: The Factor Scale weight modifier applied to each vote fot this strategy.

scaleRewardPerSecond.description: The USD value per second of Factor Scale incentives which is being distributed to depositors in this strategy.

scaleRewardPriceUsd.description: The USD value of the incentive token distributed via Factor Scale.

assetAddress.description: The contract address of the underlying token (i.e. asset) of the yield strategy vault.

assetName.description: The name of the underlying token (i.e. asset) of the yield strategy vault.

assetSymbol.description: The symbol of the underlying token (i.e. asset) of the yield strategy vault.

assetDecimals.description: The number of decimals of the underlying token (i.e. asset) of the yield strategy vault.

assetPriceUsd.description: The USD value of the underlying token (i.e. asset) of the yield strategy vault.

sharePriceUsd.description: The USD value of each of the yield strategy vault's share.

monthlyVolumeUsd.description: The USD value of the volume of tokens that is facilitated by this yield strategy.

apyBoost.description: The APY of incentives allocated to this strategy via Factor Boost based on current deposits.

apyBoostProjected.description: The estimated APY of Factor Boost incentives allocated to this strategy.

vaultAddress.description: The address of the Boost vault where the incentive token is held.

tokenAddress.description: The address of the token being distributed via Factor Boost.

tokenSymbol.description: The symbol of the token being distributed via Factor Boost.

minAmount.description: The minimum amount of Boost incentive tokens that can be distributed in wei.

minAmountFmt.description: The minimum amount of Boost incentive tokens that can be distributed. Formatted per incentive token decimals.

totalRewardAmount.description: The amount of incentive tokens which have been allocated to Factor Boost for this period in wei.

totalRewardAmountFmt.description: The amount of incentive tokens which have been allocated to Factor Boost for this period. Formatted per incentive token decimals.

lastUpdateTime.description: The UNIX timestamp at which the Boost allocation was last updated.

periodFinish.description: The UNIX timestamp at which the Boost allocation will be completed.

rewardPerTokenStored.description: The amount of incentive tokens that is allocated to each deposit token within the strategy in wei.

rewardPerTokenStoredFmt.description: The amount of incentive tokens that is allocated to each deposit token within the strategy in wei. Formatted per incentive token decimals.

rewardRate.description: The APR that depositors to the strategy will earn based on the period which this incentive token will be distributed.

rewardRateFmt.description: The APR that depositors to the strategy will earn based on the period which this incentive token will be distributed. Formatted per incentive token decimals.

tokenDecimal.description: The number of decimals specified by the incentive token contract.

priceUsd.description: The USD value of the incentive token.

apy.description: The APY of this Boost vault.

isBoosted.description: Indicates if the strategy is receiving Factor Boost incentives.

isRestaking.description: Indicates if the strategy is a restaking strategy.

fetched_at.description: The UNIX timestamp at which the data for this strategy was retrieved.

identifier.description: The identifier to uniquely identify the strategy.

get.description: Returns various counts which includes platform TVL, integrations, and strategies.

totalTvl.description: The TVL of all deposits on Factor vaults denominated in USD.

pairs.description: The number of token pairs/markets which are available on Factor.

leverageVaults.description: The number of leverage strategy vaults.

yieldVaults.description: The number of yield strategy vaults.

totalVaults.description: The total number of strategy vaults on Factor.

parameters.name: address

openedPositions.description: An array of user leverage strategy positions.

address.description: The address of the asset token held by the position.

amount.description: The amount of asset tokens held by the position denominated in wei.

amountFmt.description: The amount of asset tokens held by the position formatted based on asset decimals.

amountUsd.description: The USD value of asset tokens held by the position.

address.description: The address of the debt token held by the position.

amount.description: The amount of debt tokens held by the position denominated in wei.

amountFmt.description: The amount of debt tokens held by the position formatted based on debt decimals.

amountUsd.description: The USD value of debt tokens held by the position.

netValueUsd.description: The net USD value of the position (i.e. asset minus debt).

fetched_at.description: The UNIX timestamp at which the data for this strategy was retrieved.

identifier.description: The identifier to uniquely identify the strategy.

userData.description: Contains the user specific data for this unstaked strategy.

asset.description: The asset token amounts held by the user in this strategy.

balance.description: The number of asset tokens held by the user in this strategy.

balanceFmt.description: The number of asset tokens held by the user in this strategy scaled by the asset decimals.

balanceUsd.description: The USD value of the asset tokens held by the user in this strategy.

share.description: The strategy vault shares held by the user.

balance.description: The number of strategy shares held by the user.

balanceFmt.description: The number of strategy shares held by the user scaled by the share decimals.

balanceUsd.description: The USD value of the strategy shares held by the user.

pnl.description: The user's profit and loss for this strategy.

assetAddress.description: The address of the asset which the PnL is calculated on.

pnlAsset.description: The PnL of the user in asset tokens denominated in wei.

pnlAssetFmt.description: The PnL of the user in asset tokens formatted by the asset decimals.

pnlUsd.description: The USD value of the user's PnL.

pnlPercentage.description: The percentage of profit/loss incurred by the user.

stakedUserData.description: Contains the user specific data for this staked strategy.

asset.description: The asset token amounts held by the user in this strategy.

balance.description: The number of asset tokens held by the user in this strategy.

balanceFmt.description: The number of asset tokens held by the user in this strategy scaled by the asset decimals.

balanceUsd.description: The USD value of the asset tokens held by the user in this strategy.

share.description: The strategy vault shares held by the user.

balance.description: The number of strategy shares held by the user.

balanceFmt.description: The number of strategy shares held by the user scaled by the share decimals.

balanceUsd.description: The USD value of the strategy shares held by the user.

pnl.description: The user's profit and loss for this strategy.

assetAddress.description: The address of the asset which the PnL is calculated on.

pnlAsset.description: The PnL of the user in asset tokens denominated in wei.

pnlAssetFmt.description: The PnL of the user in asset tokens formatted by the asset decimals.

pnlUsd.description: The USD value of the user's PnL.

pnlPercentage.description: The percentage of profit/loss incurred by the user.

get.description: Returns the FactorDAO revenues for the current cycle.

estimatedAPR.description: The estimated APR that a FCTR staker can expect to receive at the next revenue share distribution.

actualAPR.description: The actual APR that a FCTR staker will receive on revenue share distribution based on FactorDAO's month-to-date revenue.

actualDividendUSD.description: The month-to-date revenue share accrued by FactorDAO that will distributed at the next cycle.

todayIncome.description: The income generated by the FactorDAO for today, denominated in USD.

veFCTRSupply.description: The total supply of veFCTR tokens (i.e. staked FCTR tokens adjusted for stake duration).

veFCTRTotalUSD.description: The USD value of all veFCTR tokens.

block.description: The current block count (i.e. block height).

factorPrice.description: The USD price of the FCTR token.

lastDistributionUSD.description: The USD value of all revenue share amounts that were distributed in the last cycle.

fetchedAt.description: The UNIX timestamp at which the FactorDAO revenues were retrieved.

last30.description: DAO revenue figures for the last 30 days.

averageAPR.description: The daily moving/rolling average APR per veFCTR.

totalDividends.description: The USD value of FactorDAO revenue allocated to veFCTR revenue share.

dailyAverageDividends.description: The daily moving/rolling average USD value of revenue shaare that is allocated to veFCTR revenue share.

last60.description: DAO revenue figures for the last 30 days.

averageAPR.description: The daily moving/rolling average APR per veFCTR.

totalDividends.description: The USD value of FactorDAO revenue allocated to veFCTR revenue share.

dailyAverageDividends.description: The daily moving/rolling average USD value of revenue shaare that is allocated to veFCTR revenue share.

get.description: Returns the FactorDAO revenues for the month queried.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year which is being queried in YYYY format.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: The month which is being queried in MM format with no leading zeroes.

schema.description: An array of FactorDAO daily revenues for the month queried.

revenue.description: The USD value of FactorDAO revenue accrued for the day.

factorPrice.description: The USD price of the FCTR token.

block.description: The current block count (i.e. block height).

vetoken_supply.description: The total supply of veFCTR tokens (i.e. staked FCTR tokens adjusted for stake duration).

last_distribution.description: The amount of USDC tokens (in wei) distributed in the last cycle.

fetched_At.description: The UNIX timestamp at which the FactorDAO revenues were retrieved.
